Title: Weaponizer
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jason Ning, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Lucifer's brother Uriel shows up as he investigates the murder of his favorite action hero.
